skills.name: Keen Rauðrwolf Plus ATK
skills.effect: Effective against cavalry foes.

skills.name: Absorb
skills.effect: Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

skills.name: Absorb Plus SKILL1
skills.effect: Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt. After combat, if unit attacked, restores 7 HP to allies within 2 spaces of unit. Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

skills.name: Absorb Plus SKILL2
skills.effect: Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt. After combat, if unit attacked, restores 7 HP to allies within 2 spaces of unit. Foe cannot counterattack.

skills.name: Aegis
skills.effect: If foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from that foe's attack by 50%.

skills.name: Aerobatics 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

skills.name: Aerobatics 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

skills.name: Aerobatics 3
skills.effect: Unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

skills.name: Aether
skills.effect: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat. Restores HP = half of damage dealt.

skills.name: Alondite
skills.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

skills.name: Amiti
skills.effect: Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

skills.name: Ardent Sacrifice
skills.effect: Restores 10 HP to target ally. Unit loses 10 HP but cannot go below 1.

skills.name: Ardent Service
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ardent Service Plus
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ardent Service Plus ATK
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ardent Service Plus DEF
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ardent Service Plus RES
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ardent Service Plus SPD
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Armads
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

skills.name: Armor March 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Armor March 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Armor March 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an armored ally, unit and adjacent armored allies can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Armored Blow 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

skills.name: Armored Blow 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

skills.name: Armored Blow 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

skills.name: Armored Boots
skills.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Armorslayer
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorslayer Plus
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus ATK
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus DEF
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus RES
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus SKILL1
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes. Neutralizes armored foes' bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

skills.name: Armorsmasher Plus SPD
skills.effect: Effective against armored foes.

skills.name: Assassins Bow
skills.effect: Effective against flying foes. In combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

skills.name: Assassins Bow Plus
skills.effect: Effective against flying foes. In combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

skills.name: Astra
skills.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 150%.

skills.name: Atk Opening 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

skills.name: Atk Opening 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

skills.name: Atk Opening 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+6 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

skills.name: Atk Ploy 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Atk Ploy 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Atk Ploy 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Atk Smoke 1
skills.effect: Inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

skills.name: Atk Smoke 2
skills.effect: Inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

skills.name: Atk Smoke 3
skills.effect: Inflicts Atk-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

skills.name: Atk Tactic 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

skills.name: Atk Tactic 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

skills.name: Atk Tactic 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.
